The Quranic researcher is that they are the hall of hell, the scaling of its freedom to what the Khalil said.It was said: They are inside it, and then it was said to the arrangement of the arrangement, but it is based on what is with them, for if the hell prayed with them more than their hijab, from their mind The believers, especially those who are the ones who are the ones who have their grace from them, for the veil is a torment that is not condemned by torment.
